Table.name: SMINM
Table.sql: SELECT *,(SELECT TOP 1 PIC FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO =A.SHPR_CD AND STATUS='U') AS PIC, (SELECT TOP (1) CD_DESCP FROM BSCODE WHERE CD = A.PLTU) AS TTL_PLT_DESCP FROM SMINM A WHERE A.U_ID=':=uid'

Table.name: SMINP
Table.sql: SELECT B.* FROM SMINP B WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SMINM A WHERE A.U_ID=':=uid' AND A.U_ID=B.U_FID)

Table.name: SMDN
Table.sql: SELECT C.* FROM SMDN C WHERE EXISTS (SELECT B.* FROM SMINP B WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SMINM A WHERE A.U_ID=':=uid' AND A.U_ID=B.U_FID) AND B.DN_NO=C.DN_NO )

Table.name: SMRV
Table.sql: SELECT CNTR_NO, SEAL_NO1, CNTY_TYPE,DN_NO FROM SMRV WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SMINM A WHERE A.U_ID=':=uid' AND A.SHIPMENT_ID=SMRV.SHIPMENT_ID)
